item.title: Omg!, if i trade a shop, it dc's me! help!?
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

[quote=“icauseownage, post:8, topic:71643”]put this::

}
else if (NPCID == 209) { // fletching
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 2;

bracket is on top and place this in the right section of client.java[/quote]That wouldnt work cause it doesnt matter where the brace is only if there is a brace…and that shop code looks like crap but it might be the code tags, just make sure its a npc that has a trade option when you right click and try changing the wanneshop id to somthing a little bit higher.

Read full topic

item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

put this::

}
else if (NPCID == 209) { // fletching
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 2;

bracket is on top and place this in the right section of client.java

should be around this, under it.

skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 14600; }

2. Don’t use slang speech, example: Dc’s me.
